name: 萌盟大冒险 Cute Adventure
description:
The game is now in its first season and will continue to grow.Many connoisseurs around the world have recommended this game.

The game currently has
1. Characters and weapons can be collected, upgraded and explored
2. Openworld
3. Currently supports up to 4 players online or single player games

extra season of the game map gameplay: liberty city rescue goddess
1. Explore forward, defeat the enemy and challenge the boss
2. Or interact with the scene to create an advantage, defeat wave after wave of enemies, acquire materials to upgrade attack and collect skin

Thank you for your support!
